welcome_message_body: Welcome to Taiyuan, China! This vibrant city is known for its rich history, beautiful temples, and bustling markets. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its charm. Enjoy your stay!

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
